params._initialOwner: Address that will own this contract

deactivateWorker(address).details: Does not burn NFT, just marks as deactivated      Only callable by owner in case of fraud/abuse

returns._0: True if worker is registered and active

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerBuilding(string,address).details: Only callable by owner (ArxOS LLC initially)

registerWorker(address,string).details: Only callable by owner (ArxOS LLC initially)

params.metadata: IPFS CID or JSON metadata for worker profile

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBuildingWallet(string,address).details: Only callable by owner - for handling lost keys or ownership transfers

getWorkerWallet(uint256).notice: Get worker wallet from NFT token ID

isWorkerActive(address).notice: Check if worker is registered and active

registerBuilding(string,address).notice: Register a new building with wallet address

registerWorker(address,string).notice: Register a new field worker with soulbound NFT
